import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent { showlaundryreport=false userData:any public sidebarShow: boolean = false; submitdetails(data:any){ this.showlaundryreport=false } LaundryReport(){ this.showlaundryreport=!this.showlaundryreport } }
